mapper.sql: id, uid, energy_value, type, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_energy where uid =#{uid} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%y%m%d') and `type` =#{type}

SELECT t1.energy_value - t2.energy_value FROM (select IFNULL(sum(energy_value),0) as energy_value from user_energy where `type` !=-1 and uid =#{uid} ) t1 , (select IFNULL(sum(energy_value),0) as energy_value from user_energy where `type` =-1 and uid =#{uid} ) t2
